name: Board to DEATH (Neil Sadie)
description:
YOU DIED

It was an unremarkable end to an unremarkable life. 

If only you had more time... Alas this is the way of things.

BUT maybe, just maybe, there might be a way to somehow delay the inevitable!

Strike a bargain with DEATH and try and solve all their fiendish puzzles in a desperate last ditch attempt to buy some more time.
